androidx.leanback.app

Class BrandedFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • androidx.leanback.app.BrandedFragment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseFragment, ErrorFragment
    Deprecated. 
    use BrandedSupportFragment

    @Deprecated
public class BrandedFragment
extends Fragment
    Fragment class for managing search and branding using a view that implements TitleViewAdapter.Provider.

    • Method Detail

      • onInflateTitleView

        public View onInflateTitleView(LayoutInflater inflater,
                               ViewGroup parent,
                               Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Deprecated. 
        Called by installTitleView(LayoutInflater, ViewGroup, Bundle) to inflate title view. Default implementation uses layout file lb_browse_title. Subclass may override and use its own layout, the layout must have a descendant with id browse_title_group that implements TitleViewAdapter.Provider. Subclass may return null if no title is needed.
        Parameters:
        inflater - The LayoutInflater object that can be used to inflate any views in the fragment,
        parent - Parent of title view.
        savedInstanceState - If non-null, this fragment is being re-constructed from a previous saved state as given here.
        Returns:
        Title view which must have a descendant with id browse_title_group that implements TitleViewAdapter.Provider, or null for no title view.

      • installTitleView

        public void installTitleView(LayoutInflater inflater,
                             ViewGroup parent,
                             Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Deprecated. 
        Inflate title view and add to parent. This method should be called in Fragment#onCreateView(LayoutInflater, ViewGroup, Bundle).
        Parameters:
        inflater - The LayoutInflater object that can be used to inflate any views in the fragment,
        parent - Parent of title view.
        savedInstanceState - If non-null, this fragment is being re-constructed from a previous saved state as given here.

      • showTitle

        public void showTitle(int flags)
        Deprecated. 
        Changes title view's components visibility and shows title.
        Parameters:
        flags - Flags representing the visibility of components inside title view.
        See Also:
        TitleViewAdapter.SEARCH_VIEW_VISIBLE, TitleViewAdapter.BRANDING_VIEW_VISIBLE, TitleViewAdapter.FULL_VIEW_VISIBLE, TitleViewAdapter.updateComponentsVisibility(int)

      • setOnSearchClickedListener

        public void setOnSearchClickedListener(View.OnClickListener listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets a click listener for the search affordance.

        The presence of a listener will change the visibility of the search affordance in the fragment title. When set to non-null, the title will contain an element that a user may click to begin a search.

        The listener's onClick method will be invoked when the user clicks on the search element.

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to call when the search element is clicked.

      • setSearchAffordanceColors

        public void setSearchAffordanceColors(SearchOrbView.Colors colors)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the SearchOrbView.Colors used to draw the search affordance.
        Parameters:
        colors - Colors used to draw search affordance.

      • getSearchAffordanceColors

        public SearchOrbView.Colors getSearchAffordanceColors()

        Returns the SearchOrbView.Colors used to draw the search affordance.

      • setSearchAffordanceColor

        public void setSearchAffordanceColor(int color)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the color used to draw the search affordance. A default brighter color will be set by the framework.
        Parameters:
        color - The color to use for the search affordance.

      • getSearchAffordanceColor
